item.title: 观看：德国汉莎航空公司周四警告称，该公司第一季度的运营亏损将扩大，并对2024年的前景作出了低估，因为这家德国航空公司正在与代价高昂的劳资纠纷作斗争。
item.description:

item.title: 观看：中国1-2月进出口增长超过预期，表明全球贸易正在出现转机，这对试图支撑经济复苏乏力的政策制定者来说是一个令人鼓舞的信号。
item.description:
WATCH: China's export and import growth in the January-February period beat forecasts, suggesting global trade is turning a corner, in an encouraging signal for policymakers as they try to shore up a stuttering economic recovery https://t.co/Kyxej78TNp pic.twitter.com/KgKOR34fj5

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 7, 2024

item.title: 观看：特斯拉表示，其位于德国的工厂预计将在3月17日之前停电，此前一场疑似纵火袭击导致该公司位于柏林郊外的千兆工厂停电，被迫停止生产。
item.description:
WATCH: Tesla said its plant in Germany was expected to have no electricity until Mar. 17, after a suspected arson attack left the company's gigafactory outside Berlin without power, forcing it to halt production https://t.co/gDdvmZo1iU pic.twitter.com/s5LxA8os5U

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 7, 2024

item.title: 德国面临三方面的罢工，火车司机、机场安检人员和汉莎航空地勤人员相继离职，给这个欧洲最大经济体的数百万旅客带来了更多麻烦。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Germany faced strikes on three fronts, as train drivers, airport security workers and Lufthansa ground staff walked off the job, spelling further headaches for millions of travelers in Europe's largest economy. More here: https://t.co/GU9WAVaHV3

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 7, 2024

item.title: 德国最大的房地产融资机构之一--德国储蓄银行（Deutsche Pfandbriefbank）公布了自上市以来最低的年度利润和最大的贷款损失，凸显了房地产普遍低迷的严重性。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Deutsche Pfandbriefbank, one of Germany's top property financiers, posted its lowest annual profit and biggest loss for soured loans since going public, underscoring the severity of a widespread real-estate slump. More here: https://t.co/DP0QzbJsJo

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 7, 2024

item.title: 观看：海关数据显示，作为世界第二大经济体，中国1-2月份的出口额比上年同期增长了7.1%，超出了经济学家的预期。进口增长 3.5%，也远超预期。
item.description:
WATCH: Exports from China, the world's second-biggest economy, in January-February period were 7.1% higher than a year before, customs data showed, beating economists’ expectations. Imports rose 3.5%, also far more than forecast https://t.co/Kyxej78lXR pic.twitter.com/OuPjSGCz0G

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 7, 2024

item.title: 更正：减肥药 Wegovy 的制造商诺和诺德公司表示，将提交其备受期待的肥胖症药物 amycretin 的早期试验数据。我们正在删除一个包含错误信息的帖子
item.description:
CORRECTION: Novo Nordisk, maker of weight loss drug Wegovy, said it would present early trial data for amycretin, its highly anticipated obesity drug. We are deleting a post containing incorrect information https://t.co/Pgun8skAVP

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 7, 2024

item.title: 欧洲中央银行将把利率维持在历史最高水平，并在未来几个月内采取小步减息措施，因为尽管潜在的价格压力居高不下，但通胀率仍在持续下降。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
The European Central Bank is set to keep interest rates at record highs and take baby steps towards cutting them in the coming months as inflation continues to fall despite stubbornly high underlying price pressures. More here: https://t.co/zdVZw5reqa

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 7, 2024

item.title: 肥胖症药物威高维（Wegovy）的生产商诺和诺德公司表示，它将提交备受期待的用于治疗2型糖尿病的管线药物淀粉样蛋白的早期试验数据。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Novo Nordisk, maker of obesity drug Wegovy, said it would present early-stage trial data for its highly anticipated pipeline drug, amycretin, for treatment of Type 2 diabetes. More here: https://t.co/mS8wB3LGmW

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 7, 2024

item.title: 汉莎航空（Lufthansa）如期公布了 2023 年 29.4 亿美元的营业利润，但由于与劳资纠纷的斗争，该公司将 2024 年的营业利润率预期从 8%的目标下调至 7.6%。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Lufthansa reported an operating profit of $2.94 billion for 2023 as expected, adjusting its outlook for its 2024 operating margin down to 7.6% from a goal of 8% as it struggles with labor disputes. More here: https://t.co/UO2XGoxiCT

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 7, 2024
